header.overview: The header defines a macro that whether a configuration flag is set.

macro.abstract: The macro detects whether its argument is defined as 1 or with an empty replacement list.
macro.para: This macro detects whether its argument is defined as 1 or with an empty replacement list.
The id argument must expand to 0, expand to 1, expand to nothing, or not expand at all. Any other input is undefined.
